page.title: 04A day in the life of Amelia
page.content: My name is Amelia Brunt and I am 11 years old. During school time I get up at 8.00am. My dad takes me to school in his van. He drops me off on his way to work. School starts at 8.55am. We have service at about 9.15am. We have 15 minutes play at 10.30. After dinner on Mondays we go swimming and on Friday afternoons we have sewing. I have made a blouse during sewing lessons. We have games on Tuesdays and P.E. on Friday afternoons. The lessons we have are English, History, Maths, Sience,Geography, Computer Work, Handwriting and Art. We have the chance to learn the guitar, violin and recorder. We go home at 3.45pm. When I get home I watch T.V or do some cooking. After my tea I help my mum do the dishes. I go to bed at 9.30pm.
